name: Retro Fusion
description:
It's a platformer game, where your character is dropped into a world where several retro games are mixed together. During the game you will encounter 8 different types of enemies and 10 special items. Collect three keys to escape.

CONTROLS

A D / Left Right - Movement

Space / Up arrow - Jump

E - Activate/Use Item

F - Use Item

Q - Delete Item

Scroll - Switch Item
